This is my favorite game. Ever. This is a one in a lifetime experience, the JOY of performing and solving problems is inefable. Gameplay is so satisfying, puzzles are clever and balanced, all puzzle elements are iconic.

The main singleplayer campaign has depth, a great dose of humour and HUGE character development, and is not unnecessarily long. And, after finishing it, you're gifted with COMMUNITY CREATED levels. There is some awesome content there, not to mention other standalone mods already available on the Steam Store (some requiring the original game, others not).

Finally: GET. THIS. GAME.

Worth mentioning: the default DX9 API may result in broken lighting, at least in AMD cards running recent drivers. To fix that, you must add -vulkan in the startup options. It may be stuttery for the first minutes of gameplay, but after that, it's flawless.

I have one word to describe this game : amazing.


Everything about this game is so impressive for its time of release. The storyline, the graphics, the characters, the scenery as you're moving through the ruined building are all unbelievably breathtaking. I found myself stopping to admire the scenery quite often as i played and couldn't keep my jaw shut i was so amazed. If you're looking for a game thats bittersweet, comedic, heartwarming, and has some of the best music, play this game. Don't hesitate for a second on buying it because it is worth it.
